Mục lục trang

xView1 Dataset Images ​

Complete image collection for xView1 dataset documentation.

Contents ​

  • image-sources.md - Comprehensive catalog with URLs, descriptions, licenses, and recommended uses
  • dataset/ - Downloaded image files (17 images, 8.1 MB total)

Quick Stats ​

MetricValue
Total Images17
Total Size8.1 MB
Paper Figures12 (from ArXiv)
Dataset Viz2 (from DatasetNinja)
Samples3 (satellite images)
Download Date2025-12-19

Image Categories ​

Paper Figures (12 images) ​

From xView WACV 2018 paper (ArXiv 1802.07856):

  • Sample imagery & geographic diversity (fig1, fig6)
  • Dataset comparisons (fig2, fig9, fig10)
  • Annotation methodology (fig3, fig7, fig8)
  • Statistical analysis (fig4a, fig4b, fig5)
  • Class reference (fig11)

Dataset Statistics (2 images) ​

From DatasetNinja:

  • Poster with key statistics
  • Class distribution heatmaps

Sample Imagery (3 images) ​

Satellite sample images showing real dataset content

Usage Guide ​

See image-sources.md for:

  • Full URLs and local filenames
  • Detailed descriptions and use cases
  • Dimension and file size info
  • License/attribution details
  • Recommended document integration

Key Files ​

For Overviews: poster.png, fig10-geographic-map.png For Statistics: fig4a-class-distribution.png, class-heatmaps.png For Methodology: fig3-qgis-annotation.png, fig7-quality-control.png For Class Reference: fig11-class-examples.png For Samples: sample-image-*.tif files

Attribution ​

All images sourced from:

  1. xView Paper: https://arxiv.org/abs/1802.07856
  2. DatasetNinja: https://datasetninja.com/xview
  3. Official Site: https://xviewdataset.org/

For detailed attribution, see image-sources.md
